account_start_message: Enter account details in the format: `accountId:apiKey:apiSecretKey (+optional):proxyIp:proxyPort:proxyLogin:proxyPassword`
account_wrong_data: Invalid account data format. Please try again.
input_error_message:
There was an issue, please check your input!
Let's try again.
trade_config_tokens: Enter the list of tokens for trading, separated by commas (e.g., BTC, ETH):
trade_config_leverage: Enter leverage (1 for Spot, 2-10 for Perp trading, default: 1):
trade_config_wait_before_sell: Enter waiting time before selling (in seconds, default: 10):
trade_config_wait_between_cycles: Enter waiting time between cycles (in seconds, default: 30):
trade_config_time_range: Enter time range in seconds for random intervals (default: 5):
trade_config_max_volume: Enter the maximum volume (in USD, default: 1000):
trade_config_min_balance_usd: Enter the minimum balance (in USD, default: 50):
trade_config_complete: All data is already filled in.
trade_config_invalid_tokens: Invalid data. BTC is used by default.
trade_stop_hint: To stop trading, use the /stop command.
